text: The Right Reverend Ernest Vincent Shayler (October 11, 1868 - June 25, 1947) was fourth bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of Nebraska. A graduate of Bexley Hall, he was consecrated on September 11, 1919 and served until 1938. == See also == *List of bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America == References == *"Bishop Shayler Dies" in The Living Church, July 6, 1947, p. 5\. Category:1868 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America
title: Ernest Vincent Shayler
